Instruction: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Grease a 9x13 inch baking dish with the melted butter.

Combine an assortment of fresh herbs, such as basil, parsley, and thyme, minced garlic, olive oil, and balsamic vinegar in a small bowl. Drizzle the herb mixture over the tomatoes and mozzarella on a large plate.
Bake in the preheated oven for 15 to 20 minutes. Serve while hot.
